main event: Observers reported seeing a red object moving erratically in the sky over Rockaway, New Jersey.
interesting points: The object was observed at high altitudes between 3,000 to 5,000 feet and was visible for about 12 to 15 minutes., The object exhibited unusual behavior, pausing and changing directions unexpectedly., Witnesses described the object as having a brilliant red body with a bright bluish-white light at the rear., The object's characteristics differed from those of conventional aircraft, being larger and brighter than nearby planes., Witnesses utilized binoculars for a closer view of the object.
sighted object: a red object with a bluish-white light
